com.movlad.pcl

Class NormalEstimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.pcl.NormalEstimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class NormalEstimation
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Launches the pcl::NormalEstimation<PointInT, PointOutT> algorithm on the native side which computes the normal in each point. The steps are, for each point p:
    1. get p's neighbors within a radius
    2. form a plane with p and each of its neighbors, 2 by 2
    3. compute the normal to each plane formed and perform an average at the end of the interation
    See Also:
    pcl::NormalEstimation documentation
